assignments.description: Add the current loop item's text template to the output text variable for display on the results screen.
assignments.name: Add_Record_Details_to_Output_Variable
assignments.label: Add Record Details to Output Variable

assignments.description: Add the current loop item's text template to the output text variable for display on the results screen.
assignments.name: Add_templateRecordDetails_to_loopedFinalOutput
assignments.label: Add templateRecordDetails to loopedFinalOutput

assignments.description: Adds the triggering record to the recordIdsCollection.
assignments.name: Add_to_recordIdsCollection
assignments.label: Add to recordIdsCollection

assignments.description: Assigned the record variable to the collection. Used to create product transfer state records in the following Create Records element.
assignments.name: Assign_Product_Transfer_States
assignments.label: Assign Product Transfer States

assignments.description: Assigns the product transfer that has just been created, along with the helper field to a collection. This is to loop over for the creation of product transfer state records.
assignments.name: Assign_Record_to_Collection
assignments.label: Assign Record to Collection

assignments.description: Assigns the current serialised product id to the helper field. This is to associate the product transfer state to the correct serialised product.
assignments.name: Assign_Serialized_Product_Helper
assignments.label: Assign Serialized Product Helper

assignments.description: Assigns the required values to the product transfers record. Used to update the product transfer to accept the move.
assignments.name: Assign_Transfer_IsReceived_and_Quantity
assignments.label: Assign Transfer IsReceived and Quantity

assignments.description: Assigned the record variable to the collection. Used in the following Update Records element.
assignments.name: Assign_Updated_Product_Transfer
assignments.label: Assign Updated Product Transfer

assignments.description: Assigns the record variable to a collection. Used in the following Update Records element to update the serialised products.
assignments.name: Assign_Updated_Serialized_Products
assignments.label: Assign Updated Serialized Products

assignments.description: Assigned required values to the product transfer state record variable.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Create_Product_Transfer_States
assignments.label: Assignment for Create Product Transfer States

assignments.description: Assigns updated values to the serialised product record variable. Used to update serialised products after they have been moved.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Update_Serialized_Products
assignments.label: Assignment for Update Serialized Products

decisions.description: Checks if the record type returned properly or if there was an error.
decisions.name: Check_if_Valid_Record_Type
decisions.label: Check if Valid Record Type

decisions.description: Checks if the Return Comments field was filled out.
decisions.name: Comments_Completed
decisions.label: Comments Completed?

decisions.description: Checks if the user checked the checkbox to begin the inspection process.
decisions.name: Launch_Inspection_Subflow
decisions.label: Launch Inspection Subflow?

decisions.description: Checks if record is part of a multiset.
decisions.name: Multiset_Check
decisions.label: Multiset Check

decisions.description: Decides if the item is valid by recordId.ID, status, and active state.
decisions.name: Valid_ENID
decisions.label: Valid ENID

decisions.description: Decides if the item is valid by recordId.ID, status, and active state.
decisions.name: Valid_Parent_ENID
decisions.label: Valid Parent ENID

Flow.description: Flow to allow Field Service Mobile app users to book in items back to a store. Creates product transfers, product transfer states, updates product transfers, and updates serialised products. Items are booked back in to their base location quarantine area automatically.
Flow.label: Compliance Stores - Book In

loops.description: Loops the created product transfers to create product transfer states.
loops.name: Loop_Created_Product_Transfers
loops.label: Loop Created Product Transfers

loops.description: Loops the previously created product transfers. Used to update the transfers to receive the items.
loops.name: Loop_for_Update_Transfers
loops.label: Loop for Update Transfers

loops.description: Loops the collection of items to create product transfers.
loops.name: Loop_recordIdsCollection
loops.label: Loop recordIdsCollection

loops.description: Loop each member of the Collection Variable of previously found Serialized Products.
loops.name: Loop_recordIdsCollection_for_Display
loops.label: Loop recordIdsCollection for Display

loops.description: Loops the previous serialised products. Used to update the items to show new location/owner/etc.
loops.name: Loop_recordIdsCollection_for_Update
loops.label: Loop recordIdsCollection for Update

loops.description: Loop each member of the Collection Variable of the updated Serialized Products.
loops.name: Loop_Updated_Serialized_Products
loops.label: Loop Updated Serialized Products

recordCreates.description: Creates a product transfer for each serialised product in the record collection. It is generally bad practice to perform DML operations within a loop. It is done here due to Field Service Mobile Flow restrictions. See https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mfs_flow_considerations.htm&type=5 for more details.
recordCreates.name: Create_Product_Transfer_Records
recordCreates.label: Create Product Transfer Records

recordCreates.description: Uses the collection variable to create product transfer states. Used to correctly move items.
recordCreates.name: Create_Product_Transfer_State_Records
recordCreates.label: Create Product Transfer State Records

recordCreates.description: Creates a note record and associates it to the serialised product. Note is only created if the Return Comments field was completed.
recordCreates.name: Create_Return_Comments_Note
recordCreates.label: Create Return Comments Note

recordLookups.description: Get the quarantine area associated with the current item's base location. This is to ensure that the item is returned to both its properly location and to quarantine.
recordLookups.name: Get_Base_Location_Quarantine_Area
recordLookups.label: Get Base Location's Quarantine Area

recordLookups.description: Gets all the records that share the same Parents ENID as the triggering record and stores them in the recordIdsCollection variable.
recordLookups.name: Get_Multiset_Sibling_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Multiset Sibling Records

recordLookups.description: Gets records that match the input, matching the Parent ENID. Record must be active and the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Parent_Serialized_Product_from_inputENID
recordLookups.label: Get Parent Serialized Product from inputENID

recordLookups.description: Gets the Compliance Stores record type for use in later product transfer creation.
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type_for_Product_Transfer
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type for Product Transfer

recordLookups.description: Get the Compliance Stores record type to be used in later Get Records elements.
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type_for_Serialized_Products
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type for Serialized Products

recordLookups.description: Gets records that match the input, matching the ENID. Record must be active and the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Product_from_inputENID
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Product from inputENID

recordUpdates.description: Updates the previously created product transfers. Used to receive the item that has been transferred.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Product_Transfer_Record
recordUpdates.label: Update Product Transfer Record

recordUpdates.description: Updates the serialised products using the collection variable from the previous loop.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Serialized_Products
recordUpdates.label: Update Serialized Products

screens.description: Allows the user to type in or scan an ENID.
screens.name: captureENID
screens.label: Enter Energy Networks ID

fields.name: inputENID
fields.fieldText: Input or Scan Energy Networks ID:

screens.description: Display the collection variable text template and allow users to enter a return comment for the book in.
screens.name: DisplayRecord
screens.label: Display Record

fields.name: DisplayConfirmation
fields.fieldText: Confirm the return to quarantine for the following item(s):﻿

screens.description: Display confirmation message and updated record details of Serialize Products.
screens.name: FinalConfirmation
screens.label: Final Confirmation

fields.name: FinalConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText: The below item(s) are now booked in:

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_launch_the_inspection_process
fields.fieldText: Would you like to launch the inspection process?

fields.name: invalidENIDMessage
fields.fieldText: The chosen Energy Networks ID is not valid. Please input or scan the ID for an item that is available for Book In.

screens.description: Displays an error message to the user if the record type does not return properly.
screens.name: InvalidRecordType
screens.label: Invalid Record Type

fields.name: invalidRecordTypeIdMessage
fields.fieldText:
Something has gone wrong. Please give an administrator the below details:


Record Type ID for Product Transfer cannot be found.

subflows.description: Launches Compliance Stores Self Inspect Mobile Flow.
subflows.name: Launch_Self_Inspect
subflows.label: Launch Self Inspect

textTemplates.description: Text template to display record details after updates. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
textTemplates.name: templateFinalDetails
textTemplates.text:
Name

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Type__c}

Energy Networks ID

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Manufacturer

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Manufacturer__c}

Current Location

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Location_Name__c}

Status

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Safety Check Due

{!CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts.SPEN_Safety_Check_Date__c}

____________________

textTemplates.description: Text template to display record details after updates. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
textTemplates.name: templateFinalOutput

textTemplates.description: Text template to display record details after Get Records. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
textTemplates.name: templateOutput

textTemplates.description: Text template to display record details after Get Records. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
textTemplates.name: templateRecordDetails
textTemplates.text:
Name

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Type__c}

Energy Networks ID

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Manufacturer

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Manufacturer__c}

Current Location

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Location_Name__c}

Status

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Safety Check Due

{!CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay.SPEN_Safety_Check_Date__c}

____________________

variables.description: Record variable for product transfer. Used in loop to create product transfer state records.
variables.name: createdProductTransfer

variables.description: Collection to hold product transfers. Used after loop to create product transfer state records.
variables.name: createdProductTransfers

variables.description: Loop record variable for product transfer. Used in loop to create product transfer state records.
variables.name: CurrentItemFromLoopCreatedProductTransfers

variables.description: Loop record variable for product transfer. Used in loop to update product transfer records.
variables.name: CurrentItemfromLoopforUpdateTransfers

variables.description: Loop record variable for serialised product. Used in loop to create product transfer records.
variables.name: CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollection

variables.description: Loop record variable for serialised products. Used in loop to display serialised product record details.
variables.name: CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforDisplay

variables.description: Loop record variable for serialised products. Used in loop to update serialised product records.
variables.name: CurrentItemfromLooprecordIdsCollectionforUpdate

variables.description: Loop record variable for serialised products. Used in loop to display updated serialised product records.
variables.name: CurrentItemfromLoopUpdatedSerializedProducts

variables.description: Input variable to capture ID of triggering record. Similar to recordId in a Screen Flow.
variables.name: Id

variables.description: Text variable to hold record details after updates. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
variables.name: loopedFinalOutput

variables.description: Text variable to hold record details after Get Records. Used due to Field Service Mobile Flow limitations.
variables.name: loopedOutput

variables.description: Record variable for product transfer state. Used in loop to create product transfer state records.
variables.name: productTransferState

variables.description: Collection to hold product transfer states. Used after loop to create product transfer state records.
variables.name: productTransferStates

variables.description: Record variable for serialised product. Used to hold details of serialised product for validation checks and to create product transfer records.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Collection to hold serialised products. Used before and after loop to create product transfers and update serialised products.
variables.name: recordIdsCollection

variables.description: Record variable for location. Used to hold location details for product transfer destination as well as new location and owner for updated serialised products.
variables.name: recordLocation

variables.description: Record variable for product transfer record type. Used in loop to create product transfer records.
variables.name: recordtypeProductTransfer

variables.description: Record variable for serialised product record type. Used in loop to create serialised product records.
variables.name: recordtypeSerializedProduct

variables.description: Record variable for product transfer. Used in loop to update product transfer records.
variables.name: updatedProductTransfer

variables.description: Collection to hold product transfers. Used after loop to update product transfers.
variables.name: updatedProductTransfers

variables.description: Record variable for serialised product. Used in loop to update serialised product records.
variables.name: updatedSerializedProduct

variables.description: Collection to hold serialised products. Used after loop to update serialised products.
variables.name: updatedSerializedProducts

variables.description: Input variable to capture ID of running user.
variables.name: UserId
